attributes.action: Investigation into what the uk taxpayers money is spent on in the Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: Because people of the uk are suffering
attributes.background: Prove to the uk taxpayers what the money is spent on.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Information about what UK money is being provided is available here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/uk-support-to-ukraine-factsheet/uk-support-to-ukraine-factsheet

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
